DOC.brief_summary: The study design non interventional observe continuation rate patient satisfaction woman LNG-IUS ( Levonorgestrel release Intrauterine system ) insert contraception period 12 month real life condition India.The study begin study approval ethic committee.All Indian woman age 18-49 year initiate LNG IUS therapy contraception include study take informed consent.Patients observe upto 12 months.The study involve general examination patient , collection data like medical history , previous contraceptive use , concomitant medication etc.The study plan enroll 600 subject multiple study center spread across India . The study data analyze appropriate statistical method .
